text:
Hey team, looking to work with Zoe Wright for Big W. 
            Budget is approx $4,836 - need 3 x Store opening, 1 x Twitter post, 3 x 30-second Instagram reel, 1 x Facebook post, 1 x Instagram story. 5 weeks exclusivity, 3 month engagement. Usage: 9 months. Start date: September 2025. Additional notes: TBC on exact dates, around $4,836 budget
